title: Bible Stories for Children #1 - MP3 version
description:
Bible Stories (Dramatized) for children.  To purchase the tapes or CDs, please visit the following website: <a href=" http://yourstoryhour.org/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://yourstoryhour.org/</a>

This is the MP3 format.


This is the first series which contain the following stories:

Adam and Eve:  Adam and Eve.  This is the story of creation and the fall of man.

Cain & Abel and The Man Who Believed What God Said (Part 1):  Cain & Able.  The story of the world's first murderer.   

Cain & Abel and The Man Who Believed What God Said (Part 1):  The Man Who Believed What God Said (Part 1)  Noah and the flood.

The Man Who Believed What God Said (Part 2):  The Man Who Believed What God Said (Part 2).  The completion of the story of Noah and the flood.

The Temple Tower:  The Temple Tower.  The story of construction and destruction of the Tower of Babel.

The Call of Abraham:  The Call of Abraham.  God calls Abraham to leave Ur and leads him to a new land.

The Three Strangers:  The Three Strangers.  Abraham receives a visit from heavenly messengers.

Sodom:  Sodom.  The story of Sodom and Gomorrah and how the angles go to save Lot's family.

The Supreme Test:  The Supreme Test.  Abraham is asked to sacrifice his son Isaac.

The Strange Romance:  The Strange Romance.  Abraham sends his servant to find a wife 
for his son Isaac.

The Unlike Twins:  The Unlike Twins.  Isaac and Rebecca have twin boys, Esau and Jacob.  Jacob takes Esau's birthright by deception.

The Cheating Twin Cheated:  The Cheating Twin Cheated.  Jacob flees from Esau and works for his uncle Laban.  Jacob is tricked into marrying Leah.  Jacab also marries Rachel.

The Mystery of the Disappearing Idols:  The Mystery of the Disappearing Idols.  Jacob decides to leave Laban's camp and take his family back to Canaan.  Before they leave camp Rachel steals her father's idols.

The Case of the Wrestling Twin:  The Case of the Wrestling Twin.  Jacob is distressed about meeting his brother Esau.  He spends the night in prayer and wresling with an Angel. 

The Coat Of Many Colors:  The Coat of Many Colors.  Jacob play favorites with his sons.  This causes jealousy between Joseph and his brothers and they sell Joseph as a slave.


Mrs. Potiphar and the Dungeon:  Mrs. Potiphar and the Dungeon.  Joseph, now a slave in Egypt, is accused of something he did not do and is thrown in prison.

The King's Butler and the King's Baker:  The King's Butler and the King's Baker.  Joseph, now in prison, interprets the dream of two fellow prisoners.

The King and the Slave:  The King and the Slave.  After interpreting Pharaoh's dream, Joseph is made prime minister of Egypt.

The Unreasonable Prime Minister:  The Unreasonable Prime Minister.  Joseph's brother's go to Egypt to buy food during the famine.

The Governor's Mysterious Feast:  The Governor's Mysterious Feast.  Joseph plans a feast for his brother's.

The Long Delayed Reunion:  The Long Delayed Reunion.  Joseph is finally reunited with his father.

A Deliverer is Born:  A Deliverer is Born.  This story begins with Moses' birth, his discovering by the princess.

Moses Fulfills His Destiny:  Moses Fulfills His Destiny.  The Lord calls Moses to service for Him.

The King with the Heart of Stone:  The King with the Heart of Stone.  Pharaoh will not let the Isrealites go to worship in the wilderness so God sends plagues to Egypt.

Miracles by the Sea:  Miracles by the Sea.  Moses is now leading the Isrealites to the promise land with the Egyptians following.  God parts the Red Sea.



Hope your family enjoys them as much as mine does.
